e8c32961-91d9-462d-961d-cad44281ab21.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of high level Customer Experience and the strategy required for successful implementation from an executive level. This earner can identify the areas required for change and is able to see the benefits of a business that operates with customer centrality.
e8c32961-91d9-462d-961d-cad44281ab21.name: Customer Experience & Strategy for Executives

issuer.summary: issued by MCBI Learning and Development

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and participate in an interactive CX & Strategy for Executives workshop covering the following topics: executive-level Customer Experience, what a journey map is from a commercial aspect, financial analysis of CX, prioritising the value items for customer driven change and monitoring progress and transformation.

36694cb7-6f5b-4a74-b5b0-98ba57d8c9bf.description: This earner has participated and demonstrated and understanding in the interactive Understanding Earned Value course which has been specifically developed to highlight how a Earned Value can be used as an effective project management tool for many varying types of projects. This earner can use Earned Value to convey to colleagues and stakeholders key information about their projects.
36694cb7-6f5b-4a74-b5b0-98ba57d8c9bf.name: Understanding Earned Value

issuer.summary: issued by MCBI Learning and Development

d9623766-e441-464d-b2b2-39eb9c1dbb0b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of how to lead lean and organisational improvement initiatives with confidence and skill at an executive level. d9623766-e441-464d-b2b2-39eb9c1dbb0b.name: Leading with Lean Six Sigma

642358b0-e4f8-445a-a615-6b246b994217.description: The earner of this badge has been proven and recognised by MCBI as invested in developing their own professional skills. The holder of this badge is highly capable of many roles and positions for professional services and beyond within their own areas of expertise.
642358b0-e4f8-445a-a615-6b246b994217.name: MCBI Passport Holder

This earner has proven that they are dedicated to becoming a highly skilled and experienced professional in their field and has invested the time to confirm this outcome.

7fe9f615-db9d-4c4f-b97d-9a019f33844e.description: The earner of this badge has attended MCBI's Growth Mindset course for Oreon as part of their 2020 training series. Oreon's attendees have demonstrated an understanding of the fundamentals of Growth Mindset. This course provides learners with skills and information for the substantial beneﬁts of moving away from a ﬁxed mindset and bringing yourself and teams towards a growth, opportunity driven mindset to enhance problem solving, collaboration and innovation in the workplace.
7fe9f615-db9d-4c4f-b97d-9a019f33844e.name: Oreon | Developing a Growth Mindset

issuer.summary: issued by MCBI Learning and Development

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a Growth Mindset workshop for Oreon covering the following topics: Deﬁning what ﬁxed, mixed and growth mindsets are; the science behind learning and encouragement; the value of a growth mindset – both personal and professionally; how to use 'Appreciative Enquiry' in leading teams into a learning and resilience mindset.  This workshop creates a linkage to innovation, execution and the use of a Growth Mindset to progress a business through better leadership and more engaged staff.

031cb94d-a216-454d-91cf-707e4676d399.description: The earner of this badge has attended MCBI's Having Crucial Conversations course for Oreon as part of their 2020 training series. The earner of this badge has demonstrated the skills required for handling all sorts of behaviors and attitudes that they may encounter as a leader on their journey of dealing with inevitable challenging conversations. badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a Having Crucial Conversations workshop for Oreon covering the following topics: what is a difficult conversation, what makes it hard, the benefits of learning how to have difficult conversations, constructive vs damaging feedback and the impact on teamwork and leadership.

b2a7df59-e883-4996-83fc-44812f189658.description: The Oreon Partners 'Mindfulness' badge has been created as a part of a wider program and showcases the continued investment in people. The workshops were offered as a broader leadership and team development program within Oreon Partners and is a reflection of the ongoing commitment to professional development.

a3758933-75c6-47e1-8ad6-6a083af74130.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of a modern and emerging leadership style in which leaders encourage, inspire and motivate employees to innovate themselves and create change that will help grow and shape the future success of the company. badge_template_activities.title: Attend and participate in the highly interactive Relentless Integrity workshop covering the following topics: what is leading with integrity, how to build shared commitment through integrity, the 10 commandments of a life of integrity, creating meaning, obstacles to our success, fostering a team of servant leaders, dealing with the undesirable and creating a future with brave focus.

9359dee9-56ef-40e3-9b52-28e1e0d99a68.description: The earner of this badge has attended MCBI's Managing Conflict Positively course for Sarah Constructions as part of their 2021 training program. 309bc360-a633-4642-a20d-0ba1e4617278.description: The earner of this badge is a MCBI Accredited Mentor who holds the experience, integrity and expertise to support others in their career direction. All MCBI Accredited Mentors operate to a Code of Conduct and ethical standard. MCBI accredits no more than 10 professional mentors concurrently and offers a two year certification.
